    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractCanvasPersistenceManager
     
    AnimateMenu
     
    AStarGraphFactoryPathFinder
    Implements a path finder for the factory using a graph-based approach and A* algorithm.
    BasicCanvasPersistenceManager
    A basic persistence manager that provides functionality to save, load, and delete canvas data files.
    BasicOvalShape
    A basic implementation of the OvalShape interface.
    BasicPoint
    Basic implementation of the Point interface.
    BasicPolygonShape
    A basic implementation of the PolygonShape interface.
    BasicRectangleShape
    A basic implementation of the RectangleShape interface.
    BasicStroke
    A basic implementation of the Stroke interface.
    BasicStyle
    A basic implementation of the Style interface.
    Canvas
    Represents the canvas of canvas viewer user interface into which 2D figures will be displayed.
    CanvasChooser
    Represents an object used to chose a canvas model from the data store.
    CanvasPainter
     
    CanvasPanel
     
    CanvasPersistenceManager
    Interface providing methods to manage the persistence of canvas models into a data store such as files, databases or any other permanent storage.
    CanvasViewer
     
    CanvasViewerController
    Represents the controller used by the canvas viewer to obtain the canvas model data and to control the figures animation.
    CanvasViewerMenuBar
     
    ChargingStation
    Represents a charging station in the robot simulation.
    Color
    Specifies the color of an element to be drawn in the user interface.
    Component
    This file contains the definition of the abstract Component class, which represents a component in the robot simulation.
    ControllerWorker
     
    Conveyor
    Represents a conveyor in the robot simulation.
    DijkstraGraphFactoryPathFinder
    Implements a path finder for the factory using a graph-based approach and Dijkstra's algorithm.
    Door
    Represents a door in the robot simulation.
    Factory
    Represents a factory in the robot simulation.
    FactoryPathFinder
    Interface for finding paths within the factory.
    Figure
    Represents a figure to be displayed in the canvas of the canvas viewer user interface .
    FileCanvasChooser
    A canvas chooser that internally uses a JFileChooser to browse the file system and let the user chose a file into which the canvas model is stored.
    FileMenu
     
    GraphVisualizer
    Utility class for visualizing and exporting graphs of the factory layout.
    InvalidComponentPlacementException
    Exception thrown when an invalid placement of a component is attempted.
    Observable
    Interface for the Observer-Observable pattern.
    Observer
    Ifor the Observer-Observable pattern.
    OpenCanvasMenuItem
     
    OvalShape
    Represents an oval shape with given width and height.
    Path
    Represents a path consisting of a sequence of positions, with a target to reach.
    Point
     
    PolygonShape
    Represents a polygon shape having a given set of points.
    Position
    Represents a position in a 2D space with x and y coordinates.
    ProductionMachine
    Represents a production machine in the simulation.
    QuitMenuItem
     
    RectangleShape
    Represents a rectangle shape of given width and height.
    RGBColor
    Basic implementation of the Color interface storing the red, green and blue components as integer attributes.
    Robot
    Represents a robot in the robot simulation.
    Room
    Represents a room in the robot simulation.
    SaveCanvasMenuItem
     
    Scale
     
    Shape
    Represents the shape of elements to be displayed in a canvas viewer.
    SimulatorApplication
    Entry point for the robot simulation application.
    SimulatorApplicationTest
    Test class to launch the SimulatorApplication from a test context.
    SimulatorController
    Controller for the simulator, managing the interaction between the factory model and the canvas viewer.
    StartAnimationMenuItem
     
    StopAnimationMenuItem
     
    Stroke
    Represent the stroke properties of elements to be displayed in a canvas viewer.
    Style
    Represents a style, consisting of a background color and stroke properties.
    TestJgraphT
     
    Visitable
    Represents a visitable component in the robot simulation.
